title: Resistance

Abjuration Cantrip

Melee Concentration

Resistance is a Abjuration Cantrip in Baldur's Gate 3. It grants a bonus to Saving Throws.

BG3 Resistance Information

Description: Make a target more resistant to spell effects and conditions: it receives a +1d4 bonus to Saving Throws. Level: Cantrip School: Abjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: Melee Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: None

How to Acquire Resistance in Baldur's Gate 3

Resistance can be acquired by the following classes: Cleric, Druid

Resistance Tips & Notes in BG3

Stacks with Bless. Differs from D&D5e in that it applies to all Saving Throws rather than a single in 5e.
